channel.title: Jagex completely fucking ruined pest control. [RANT]
channel.description:
Yeah, here's my little rant.
Ok, let me give you some little numbers to fiddle with, back when we had the old system, at level 80, if you got a point, you would get 1.3k or so xp, so, I spent 10 minutes allocating my 68 points to magic, at this point I'm 35k from 81 magic. During the old system, I could complete a game in 1 minute, do the maths, that's 130k xp in 1 hour 40 minutes, plus the 30k~ you'll get during game, almost 160k in 1 hour 40 minutes. Anyway, after getting the points, and spend 20 minutes looking for a 90+ world, and almost 3 hours over the course of 4 days during the game, I was fucking HORRIFIED to find out, 320 fucking xp on a level 80 skill.
Conclusion: 62k xp in 3 hours.
Edit: Reason why I made this thread: Completely fucking wasted 1.4k shots from a 900k crystal bow, 200k for repairing barrows. I was expecting fucking 81 mage, went out my way to get it, if I fucking knew I was going to spend 1.1m for 62k xp, I would have bought 11k iron ore and got 838k smithing xp, at LEAST 225k range xp and a shit load of runes from drops to get my magic up by 100k xp.

item.title: Jagex completely fucking ruined pest control. [RANT]
item.dc:creator: @evan evan
item.description:
@evan wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:1, topic:128290”]Yeah, here’s my little rant.

Ok, let me give you some little numbers to fiddle with, back when we had the old system, at level 80, if you got a point, you would get 1.3k or so xp, so, I spent 10 minutes allocating my 68 points to magic, at this point I’m 35k from 81 magic. During the old system, I could complete a game in 1 minute, do the maths, that’s 130k xp in 1 hour 40 minutes, plus the 30k~ you’ll get during game, almost 160k in 1 hour 40 minutes. Anyway, after getting the points, and spend 20 minutes looking for a 90+ world, and almost 3 hours over the course of 4 days during the game, I was fucking HORRIFIED to find out, 320 fucking xp on a level 80 skill.

Conclusion: 62k xp in 3 hours.

Edit: Reason why I made this thread: Completely fucking wasted 1.4k shots from a 900k crystal bow, 200k for repairing barrows. I was expecting fucking 81 mage, went out my way to get it, if I fucking knew I was going to spend 1.1m for 62k xp, I would have bought 11k iron ore and got 838k smithing xp, at LEAST 225k range xp and a shit load of runes from drops to get my magic up by 100k xp.[/quote] if you got the points of the old pc game youl still get the same rate so yeah people with the old points are lucky

item.source: Jagex completely fucking ruined pest control. [RANT]

item.title: Jagex completely fucking ruined pest control. [RANT]
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Well, in Pest Control, you get normal HP exp. Its like training at rock crabs.

Then, once you spend those 100 tickets, thats anywhere from 70k-100k+ EXP, with 0 hp exp involved. after about 1.5M exp, 1M from the points alone, thats really effecting someones HP. My old main from before PC, whip’s and dragon scimmies is 82 hp at 96 combat, whilst normal is 76-79.

Read full topic

item.source: Jagex completely fucking ruined pest control. [RANT]

item.title: Jagex completely fucking ruined pest control. [RANT]
item.dc:creator: @Dgc2002 Dgc2002
item.description:
@Dgc2002 wrote:

Pest patroll was a mistake to begin with. It completely ruined combat! It made it so noobs could get 99 in a stat after a month of no lifeing. Now you actually have to work and pay for your levels. You actually have to buy food, and armor and charge your ammys. Wahhhhh =p

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex completely fucking ruined pest control. [RANT]

item.title: Jagex completely fucking ruined pest control. [RANT]
item.dc:creator: @scarscaper4life scarscaper4life
item.description:
@scarscaper4life wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:13, topic:128290”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=178914.msg1649449#msg1649449 date=1186155515]
Note, you need to get 3.5x more tickets to get the same xp as before, so even on the 100+ level you still won’t get the same amount of xp unless you have 25 people who can do the trip in 1 minute, but you can’t because of the shields.

Don’t complain, get over it. It’s better now imo because the fucking pures relied on the high lvl people, and The Un-Named, you’re lvl 92 something, I can see why you’re complaining…

No, 98. A good pc clan, or someone offering a 90+ world completely fucking shreds the 100+ boat into pieces comparing xp.
[/quote]

Thats wrong tbh, because i used to get around 1.1-1.2k exp each point.
Now i get 350 around that, and times that by 4 = 1400 i get more each time now.

WIN.[/quote]

yeah but it takes a min of 1.45mins to complete my clan could do the old 1 every 45-1min

Read full topic
